item.title: Accessing Local Data from inside Kind!
item.description: Following on from the recent kind pvc post. In this post we will explore how to bring up a kind cluster and use it to access data that you have locally on your machine via Persistent Volume Claims.

item.title: Kind Persistent Volumes
item.description: Hey Frens! This week we are exploring portable persistent volumes in kind! This is a pretty neat and funky trick!
